name: Win The Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
# Input
you will be given a ```Tic-Tac-Toe``` (3x3 Matrix)

**Input Example :**
```python
n = [['X','','X'],
     ['','O','' ],         
     ['O','','' ]]
```
# Task

Your task is to win the ```Tic-Tac-Toe``` game by putting X in the right place

**Note :** You'll always be X.

**Example :**
```python
n = [['X','','X'],
     ['','O','' ],         
     ['O','','' ]]

# You have to find the right place for X to win
# witch is here

Output -> [['X',"X",'X'],
          ['', 'O', ''],         
          ['O' ,'', '']]
```

# Output
you should return the new ```Tic-Tac-Toe``` after winning

if ```X``` can't win or ```O``` won return ```-1```

# Note

There's only going to be one solution in every ```Tic-Tac-Toe```


***Good Luck :)***
